title: 'I hate to say it but age is catching up with me' - 'tired' Westwood edged out by Thomas at Players
description: Justin Thomas emerges on a hectic final day to win the Players Championship by two strokes as Lee Westwood finishes runner-up.

title: Arsenal 2-1 Tottenham: 'A massive backward step - Jermaine Jenas on why Spurs' recent progress was 'all a lie'
description: MOTD2 pundit and former Tottenham midfielder Jermaine Jenas explains why Sunday's north London derby defeat was bad for Spurs in every way.

title: Photos from Australia: Capturing 'flash rips' and 'the edge of the world'
description: Dene Bingham photographs dangerous seas and wild places from a remote coast in Western Australia.

title: Covid-19: Charities urge vulnerable people to book vaccines
description: People with underlying health conditions who have yet to get their jab are being encouraged to do so.

title: Nazanin Zaghari-Ratcliffe due in Tehran court on new charge
description: The British-Iranian woman faces a new case, a week after being freed from a five-year prison term.

title: Bitcoin surges past $60,000 for first time
description: The volatile cryptocurrency extends its record-breaking run to reach a new high.

title: Sri Lanka adoption: The babies who were given away
description: Thousands of newborns were sold to families in Europe. Decades later, Sri Lankan mothers are trying to find them.

title: Breonna Taylor: Protest marks anniversary of police killing
description: The young black medic was shot dead when police raided her home in Louisville, Kentucky, a year ago.

title: Ageing equipment puts Army 'at risk' - report
description: The British army is likely to find itself "outgunned" in any conflict with Russian forces, MPs warn.

title: Is there an algorithm for the perfect biryani?
description: A new book argues that cooking, at its heart, is chemistry. And algorithms are the key to it.

title: Sarah Everard: Met criticised over Clapham vigil policing
description: The police's actions at a gathering to mourn the 33-year-old are condemned by politicians from all parties.

title: Covid has 'heightened' eating anxieties, say experts
description: The pandemic has been particularly challenging for people like Phoenix, say eating disorder experts.

title: Phone scammers: 'Give me £1,000 to stop calling you'
description: The rise of scam calls seems relentless - but can anything be done about them?

title: Grammys 2021: Seven things to look out for - and how to watch the ceremony
description: Everything you need to know about Sunday's show, from who's performing to potential controversies.

title: The art dealer, the £10m Benin Bronze and the Holocaust
description: Western museums are under pressure to return looted treasure, but what of those in private collections?

title: The Papers: 'Police clashes tarnish vigil', and Kate's tribute
description: Gatherings to remember murdered Sarah Everard dominate Sunday's front pages.

title: Boxing legend Marvin Hagler dies aged 66
description: Former undisputed middleweight world champion 'Marvelous' Marvin Hagler dies at the age of 66.

title: Zimbabwe's 16-year-old motocross champion on 'beating the boys'
description: Tanya Muzinda has taken on the male-dominated world of motocross - becoming her country's off-road circuits champion.

title: Saving one of the world’s rarest toads from extinction
description: The harlequin toad has been successfully bred in captivity for the first time outside Panama.

title: Almost 100 and still dancing
description: Dinkie Flowers, who is about to turn 100, says it is important "not to sit on your bum all day".

title: Garden furniture shortage no picnic for retailers
description: Supply problems are due the huge rise in demand last year and rising shipping costs.

title: Pregnancy in lockdown: The babies born into a pandemic
description: Five mothers share what it was like to be pregnant and give birth during the coronavirus pandemic.

title: Celeste: How the UK singer made a 'secret' Oscars film song
description: The singer-songwriter on movie music magic, award recognition and proving herself as a No.1 artist.

title: Pandemic impact 'yet to be felt' on high streets
description: An average of 48 outlets per day closed last year, but there may be worse to come.

title: Westwood leads DeChambeau by two at Players Championship
description: England's Lee Westwood takes a two-shot lead over Bryson DeChambeau into the final day at the Players Championship.
